sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useRef } from 'react'; import { IonMenu, IonContent, IonItem, IonList, IonLabel, IonItemDivider, IonMenuToggle } from '@ionic/react'; import '../css/Menu.css'; import '../css/Global.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHome, faCalendar, faCalendarAlt, faComments, faMapSigns, faMapMarkedAlt, faInfoCircle, faPhotoVideo, faBookOpen, faHands, faBell, faUserCircle, faCog, faQrcode, faSignOutAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { faReadme } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons'; import { auth } from '../firebase'; import { NavContext } from '@ionic/react'; const Menu: React.FC = props => { const { navigate } = useContext(NavContext); const handleLogout = async () => { await auth.signOut(); sessionStorage.clear(); // navigate('/main'); }; return(
Home Open House Programmes My Schedule Forum Campus Facilities Map Getting to SIM HQ Useful Info Social Media Study@SIM Student Life@SIM Announcements Brochures My Profile Settings QR Scanner Logout
); } export default Menu;
